column2: Rocket's Lazada gets $100 mln in bid to be Southeast Asia's Amazon June 20 Lazada
column3: the Southeast Asian online retail company founded by Germany's Rocket Internet Gmbh
column4: has secured another $100 million from investors in its bid to lift the region from its status as an e-commerce backwater.

column2: Investors hit hard as Apple bonds tank June 20 (IFR) - Investors in Apple's record US$17bn bond deal have suffered some of the biggest losses in recent investment-grade new issues
column3: with about US$760m wiped off the value of the US$8.8bn of longer-dated tranches they bought just weeks ago.

column2: ADM says in talks to sell cocoa businessUPDATE 2-ADM says in talks to sell multi-billion dollar cocoa unit NEW YORK
column3: June 20 Archer Daniels Midland Co  said on Thursday it is in talks to sell its cocoa business in a further sign that the U.S. agribusiness giant is focusing on expanding its footprint in the burgeoning global grains sector.  UPDATE 2-ADM says in talks to sell multi-billion dollar cocoa unit NEW YORK
column4: June 20 Archer Daniels Midland Co  said on Thursday it is in talks to sell its cocoa business in a further sign that the U.S. agribusiness giant is focusing on expanding its footprint in the burgeoning global grains sector. NEW YORK
column5: June 20 Archer Daniels Midland Co  said on Thursday it is in talks to sell its cocoa business.UPDATE 2-ADM says in talks to sell multi-billion dollar cocoa unit NEW YORK
column6: June 20 Archer Daniels Midland Co  said on Thursday it is in talks to sell its cocoa business in a further sign that the U.S. agribusiness giant is focusing on expanding its footprint in the burgeoning global grains sector.

column2: CORRECTED-AIRSHOW-UPDATE 1-Boeing launches 787-10 with $30 bln of ordersBoeing launches 787-10 with $30 billion of orders PARIS Boeing  launched the 787-10 version of its flagship Dreamliner aircraft at the Paris Airshow on Tuesday with 102 provisional orders worth nearly $30 billion at list prices.  Boeing launches 787-10 with $30 billion of orders PARIS Boeing  launched the 787-10 version of its flagship Dreamliner aircraft at the Paris Airshow on Tuesday with 102 provisional orders worth nearly $30 billion at list prices. (Corrects first paragraph of June 18 story to make clear orders are provisional not firm)Boeing launches 787-10 with $30 billion of orders PARIS Boeing  launched the 787-10 version of its flagship Dreamliner aircraft at the Paris Airshow on Tuesday with 102 provisional orders worth nearly $30 billion at list prices.

column4: June 20 A U.S. regulator on Thursday approved Entergy Corp's plan to spin off the electric transmission business that sparked government concern about competition in its markets.
